name: Swift Analyzer
description: Binary Ninja plugin for analyzing Swift binaries
longdescription: A Binary Ninja plugin for analyzing Swift binaries. It uses the SwiftMetadataDump tool to analyze the Swift binaries and provide type annotations for the functions and variables.

installinstructions.Darwin: 1. Install Golang 2. Install SwiftMetadataDump by running `cd SwiftMetadataDump && go install`

author: Koh M. Nakagawa
